pricingSection.title: Choose the plan that's right for you
pricingSection.description: Flexible solutions for every business scale.

oneConnection.name: One Connection
features: The AI Connecting Agent empowers BUY – SELL – COOPERATE activities + 5 key features:
1. Direct chat with the final decision-maker
2. Secure – Easy to use – Reliable
3. Expand your market to Japan and globally
4. Multi-language support
5. Flexible payment methods

starter.name: Starter User
features: AI Connecting Agent + 3 features to explore new business opportunities:
1. Search & connect for B2B trade
2. 24/7 support
3. Standard business profile

premium.name: Global Premium User
features: 1 PRIVATE AGENT + 5 PREMIUM PRIVILEGES to accelerate BUY – SELL – COOPERATE activities worldwide

1 PRIVATE AGENT with 4 key features Coordinated by an AI Agent preloaded with tokens to connect with up to 120 clients and partners within 12 months (*easily expandable by purchasing more tokens if you wish to broaden your network)
- Dedicated AI trained with your company's data
- Continuous data storage and updates
- Priority access to specialized AI Agents
- Direct engagement with the right person in charge
5 PREMIUM PRIVILEGES:
1. Global Premium User identification badge (Verified & Trusted Member)
2. Business Profile development for APAC market outreach on bcp.vn (in international English and for Vietnam, Japan, Thailand, Korea, and China markets)
3. Supported by AI combined with a Human Coordinator.
4. Connections facilitated by AI and offline business-connecting experts (depending on region)
5. Access to industry insights and multiple privileges to participate in trade and business promotion activities organized by the BCP ecosystem, AI Partners, and B2B partners within the network

additionalInfo.title: Not sure which plan is right?
additionalInfo.description: Start with the free plan and upgrade when needed. All plans can be changed flexibly.
